snippet: The Syrian government said Monday that it had arrested dozens of people in a central Syrian region that has become a flashpoint in fighting between defectors and security forces.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )

lead_paragraph: The Syrian government said Monday that it had arrested dozens of people in a central Syrian region that has become a flashpoint in fighting between defectors and security forces.

headline.main: Dozens of Arrests Are Reported as Syrian Troops Retake Town
headline.print_headline: Dozens of Arrests Are Reported As Syrian Troops Retake Town
headline.seo: Syrian Troops Retake Town; Dozens Arrested
